alert.note: Alert for Coastal Onslow; East Carteret; Southern Craven; West Carteret (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued November 07 at 4:31AM EST until November 09 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TUESDAY TO 1 PM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Up to one to three feet of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Areas in North Topsail Beach, along the lower New River, White Oak River, Bogue and Core Sounds, and adjacent tidal creeks, and areas along the lower Neuse and Trent Rivers and adjacent tidal creeks. * WHEN...From 1 AM Tuesday to 1 PM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Up to 1 to 3 feet of inundation above ground level is possible in some areas near shorelines and tidal waterways resulting in an elevated threat of property damage. Flooding will extend inland from the waterfront threatening some homes and businesses. Road closures and flooding of vehicles will be possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The highest impacts will be around the time of high tide which will be around 7:00 AM Tuesday and Wednesday. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Beaufort Marine Lab NC MLLW Categories - Minor 5.0 ft, Moderate 5.5 ft, Major 6.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor -0.8 ft, Moderate -0.3 ft, Major 0.7 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 07/07 AM 4.4 -1.4 0.6 1 None 07/07 PM 3.8 -2.0 0.8 1 None 08/07 AM 4.5 -1.3 0.8 1 None 08/08 PM 4.3 -1.5 1.4 1 None 09/08 AM 5.5 -0.3 1.7 1 Moderate 09/08 PM 4.5 -1.3 1.8 1 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Onslow; East Carteret; Southern Craven; West Carteret
